txt.en: When your Pet scores a Critical Hit, a unique buff will be bestowed from your pet unto your fellowship.

Bear:
 -5% Incoming Melee Damage
 -2% Incoming Ranged Damage

Birds:
 -5% Incoming Tactical Damage
 -2% Incoming Ranged Damage

Cats:
 +3% Melee Damage
 +2% Tactical Damage

Bog-guardian:
 +3% Ranged Damage
 +2% Tactical Damage
